amendment.description: To strike section 211 of Division B.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 44 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 33. Record Vote Number: 8.
Amendment SA 44 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S1115-1122, S1123) To strike section 211 of Division B.
